meanings.definition: Drunk to an excessive or extreme degree.
meanings.sent1: He felt overdrunk after drinking too much at the party.
meanings.sent2: She looked overdrunk as she stumbled out of the bar.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed overdrunk on catnip, rolling around in pure joy.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset painted the sky in an overdrunk haze.
meanings.sent5: The overdrunk laughter echoed through the room, filling it with merriment.

meanings.definition: Past the point of being able to control one's actions due to excessive alcohol consumption.
meanings.sent1: The overdrunk man slurred his words and could barely stand.
meanings.sent2: She regretted getting overdrunk and making a scene at the party.
meanings.sent3: The overdrunk squirrel stumbled around the park, amusing the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The overdrunk clock ticked slowly, unable to keep up with the passing time.
meanings.sent5: The overdrunk dancer twirled wildly, losing all sense of coordination.
